data.name: Aspiring Light: Gold Edition
data.detailed_description:
Augments your game with the latest hue-shift technology:
- A golden menu screen and window icon
- A sense of pride and accomplishment
- Literally nothing else

In order for the changes to appear in-game (you even have to install it yourself):
1. Right-click the game in Steam and select "Properties..."
2. Select "Local Files" and click the "Browse" button
3. You will find the "main_menu.png" and "window_icon.png" elements.
4. Navigate to "Aspiring_Light-{version}-pc/game/gui".
5. Drag and drop the files into the directory, and click "Replace the files in the destination" if prompted.
6. Enjoy your money well spent.

data.short_description: Augments your game with the latest hue-shift technology: - A golden menu screen - A golden icon - Literally nothing else

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8550U, 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce MX150
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested with given system specifications, will still likely run given lower processors and graphics cards.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8550U, 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce MX150
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac version tested on virtual machine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2.0
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8550U, 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce MX150
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Linux version tested on Ubuntu virtual machine.
